Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells transiently transfected with SNCA variants.

Readout description.Result Description: p.A53T showed increased α-synuclein aggregation and reduced clearance.
p.E46K exhibited enhanced oligomerization and toxicity in cells.
p.A30P caused increased α-synuclein fibril formation and neuronal death.
p.A53E demonstrated elevated mitochondrial dysfunction and oxidative stress.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated with three independent biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate for technical validation.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA was used as a positive control for normal protein expression.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector transfection was used as a negative control for baseline expression.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test was applied for statistical significance.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: α-synuclein levels within 10% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: α-synuclein levels exceeding 30% of wild-type control or presence of oligomers.

Material used.Description: Transgenic mice overexpressing SNCA variants were used for brain tissue analysis.

Readout description.Result Description: p.A53T mice exhibited Lewy body-like inclusions in dopaminergic neurons.
p.E46K mice showed severe neurodegeneration in the substantia nigra.
p.A30P mice displayed early-onset motor deficits and neuronal loss.
p.A53E mice had widespread α-synuclein pathology and glial activation.

Biological replicates.Description: Three cohorts of transgenic mice were analyzed per variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Brain sections were imaged in triplicate for each mouse.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice were used as controls for normal brain morphology.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic littermates served as negative controls for baseline pathology.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for group comparisons.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Absence of Lewy body-like inclusions and normal neuronal density.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Presence of Lewy body-like inclusions or >20% neuronal loss.
